name: cytogeneticist
content:

a scientist who studies or uses cytogenetics (= the study of chromosomes and how they affect the behaviour of the body's cells): A cytogeneticist with the institute said that the breakthrough will enable veterinarians to identify horses that carry genetic disorders. Clinical cytogeneticists use the procedure for diagnostic purposes. Related words

cytogenetics
